attributes.name: ld-fetch
attributes.description: Fetches the HTML content of the given URL and replaces the content of an element with it. Fires events afterwards to notify other behaviors.

attributes.name: ld-on
attributes.description: The event that triggers a fetch, such as `click` or a custom event name fired by another behavior

attributes.name: ld-target
attributes.description: The target element to replace the content of and the replacement strategy, for example `body|append`

attributes.name: ld-select
attributes.description: The content element(s) to select from the fetched content, for example `#main-content`

attributes.name: ld-interval
attributes.description: Automatically fetches the content of the given URL at the given interval, in seconds

attributes.name: ld-fire
attributes.description: Fires one or more events once a behavior, such as ld-fetch or ld-form, is finished

attributes.name: ld-form
attributes.description: Converts a form into a fetch request. Fires events afterwards to notify other behaviors.

attributes.name: ld-auto-submit
attributes.description: Automatically submits the nearest form when the value of the input changes

attributes.name: ld-upload-button
attributes.description: Opens the related file input when clicked, and submits the form when a file is selected

attributes.name: ld-modal
attributes.description: Adds Javascript behavior to a modal HTML component

attributes.name: ld-dropdown
attributes.description: Adds Javascript behavior to a dropdown HTML component

attributes.name: ld-confirm-button
attributes.description: Converts a button into a confirmation button that shows confirm / cancel buttons when clicked

attributes.name: ld-confirm-icon
attributes.description: Icon to show when the confirm button is clicked

attributes.name: ld-confirm-question
attributes.description: Question to show when the confirm button is clicked

attributes.name: ld-bookmark-item
attributes.description: Adds Javascript behavior to a bookmark list item

attributes.name: ld-bulk-edit
attributes.description: Adds Javascript behavior for bulk editing the bookmark list

attributes.name: ld-global-shortcuts
attributes.description: Adds Javascript behavior for global shortcuts

attributes.name: ld-tag-autocomplete
attributes.description: Adds Javascript behavior for converting a plain input into a tag autocomplete Svelte component
